三色旗

问题描述:一条绳子上悬挂了一组旗帜,旗帜分为三种颜色,现在需要把旗帜按顺序将相同的颜色的放在一起,没有旗帜的临时存放点,只能在绳子上操作,每次只能交换两个旗帜

例如:原本旗帜的顺序为rwbrbwwrbwbrbwrbrw需要变成bbbbbbwwwwwwrrrrrr

解决思路:遍历元素,如果元素该放到左边就与左边交换,该放到右边就与右边交换,左右边界动态调整,剩余的正好属于中间

 1public class Tricolour {
 2
 3    private final static String leftColor = "b";
 4    private final static String rightColor = "r";
 5
 6    public void tricolour(Object[] src){
 7        //中间区域的左端点
 8        int mli = 0;
 9        //中间区域的右端点
10        int mri = src.length-1;
11        //遍历元素,从mli开始到mri结束,mli与mri会动态调整,但是i比mli变化快
12        for (int i = mli; i <= mri; i++) {
13            //如果当前元素属于左边
14            if(isPartOfLeft(src[i])){
15                //将当前元素换与中间区域左端点元素互换
16                swap(src,mli,i);
17                //mli位的元素是经过处理的,一定不是红色,所以不需要再分析i位新元素
18                //左端点右移
19                mli++;
20            }
21            //如果当前元素属于右边
22            else if(isPartOfRight(src[i])){
23                //从中间区域的右端点开始向左扫描元素
24                while (mri > i) {
25                    //如果扫描到的元素属于右边,右端点左移,继续向左扫描,否则停止扫描
26                    if(isPartOfRight(src[mri])){
27                        mri--;
28                    } else {
29                        break;
30                    }
31                }
32                //将当前元素交换到中间区域右端点
33                swap(src,mri,i);
34                //右端点左移
35                mri--;
36                //mri位的元素可能是蓝色的,需要再分析i位新元素
37                i--;
38            }
39        }
40    }
41
42    private boolean isPartOfLeft(Object item){
43        return leftColor.equals(item);
44    }
45
46    private boolean isPartOfRight(Object item){
47        return rightColor.equals(item);
48    }
49
50    private void swap(Object[] src, int fst, int snd){
51        Object tmp = src[fst];
52        src[fst] = src[snd];
53        src[snd] = tmp;
54    }
55
56    public static void main(String[] args) {
57        String[] flags =
58            new String[]{"r","b","w","w","b","r","r","w","b","b","r","w","b"};
59        new Tricolour().tricolour(flags);
60        for (String flag : flags) {
61            System.out.printf("%s,",flag);
62        }
63    }
64}

汉诺塔

 1public class Hanoi {
 2
 3    private void move(int n, char a, char b, char c){
 4        if(n == 1){
 5            System.out.printf("盘%d由%s移动到%s\n",n,a,c);
 6        } else{
 7            move(n-1,a,c,b);
 8            System.out.printf("盘%d由%s移动到%s\n",n,a,c);
 9            move(n-1,b,a,c);
10        }
11    }
12
13    public static void main(String[] args) {
14        new Hanoi().move(5, 'A','B','C');
15    }
16}

斐波那契数列

 1public class Fibonacci {
 2
 3    private int[] src ;
 4
 5    public int fibonacci(int n){
 6        if(src == null){
 7            src = new int[n+1];
 8        }
 9        if(n == 0 || n==1){
10            src[n] = n;
11            return n;
12        }
13        src[n] = fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2);
14        return src[n];
15    }
16
17    public int fibonacci2(int n){
18        if(src == null){
19            src = new int[n+1];
20        }
21        src[0] = 0;
22        src[1] = 1;
23        for (int i = 2; i < src.length; i++) {
24            src[i] = src[i-1] + src[i-2];
25        }
26        return src[n];
27    }
28
29    public static void main(String[] args) {
30        Fibonacci fib = new Fibonacci();
31        int n = fib.fibonacci(20);
32        System.out.println(n);
33        for (int i : fib.src) {
34            System.out.println(i);
35        }
36    }
37}

骑士周游

骑士只能按照如图所示的方法前进,且每个格子只能路过一次,现在指定一个起点,判断骑士能否走完整个棋盘.

思路:对任意一个骑士所在的位置,找出其所有可用的出口,若无可用出口则周游失败,再对每个出口找出其可用的子出口,然后骑士移动至子出口最少的出口处,重复以上过程.

  1import java.awt.Point;
  2import static java.lang.System.out;
  3
  4public class KnightTour {
  5
  6    // 对应骑士可走的八個方向
  7    private final static Point[] relatives = new Point[]{
  8            new Point(-2,1),
  9            new Point(-1,2),
 10            new Point(1,2),
 11            new Point(2,1),
 12            new Point(2,-1),
 13            new Point(1,-2),
 14            new Point(-1,-2),
 15            new Point(-2,-1)
 16    };
 17
 18    private final static int direct = 8;
 19
 20    public KnightTour(int sideLen){
 21        this.sideLen = sideLen;
 22        board = new int[sideLen][sideLen];
 23    }
 24
 25    private int sideLen;
 26
 27    private int[][] board;
 28
 29    public boolean travel(int startX, int startY) {
 30
 31        // 当前出口的位置集
 32        Point[] nexts;
 33
 34        // 记录每个出口的可用出口个数
 35        int[] exits;
 36
 37        //当前位置
 38        Point current = new Point(startX, startY);
 39
 40        board[current.x][current.y] = 1;
 41
 42        //当前步的编号
 43        for(int m = 2; m <= Math.pow(board.length, 2); m++) {
 44
 45            //清空每个出口的可用出口数
 46            nexts = new Point[direct];
 47            exits = new int[direct];
 48
 49            int count = 0;
 50            // 试探八个方向
 51            for(int k = 0; k < direct; k++) {
 52                int tmpX = current.x + relatives[k].x;
 53                int tmpY = current.y + relatives[k].y;
 54
 55                // 如果这个方向可走，记录下来
 56                if(accessable(tmpX, tmpY)) {
 57                    nexts[count] = new Point(tmpX,tmpY);
 58                    // 可走的方向加一個
 59                    count++;
 60                }
 61            }
 62
 63            //可用出口数最少的出口在exits中的索引
 64            int minI = 0;
 65            if(count == 0) {
 66                return false;
 67            } else {
 68                // 记录每个出口的可用出口数
 69                for(int l = 0; l < count; l++) {
 70                    for(int k = 0; k < direct; k++) {
 71                        int tmpX = nexts[l].x + relatives[k].x;
 72                        int tmpY = nexts[l].y + relatives[k].y;
 73                        if(accessable(tmpX, tmpY)){
 74                            exits[l]++;
 75                        }
 76                    }
 77                }
 78
 79                // 从可走的方向中寻找最少出路的方向
 80                int tmp = exits[0];
 81                for(int l = 1; l < count; l++) {
 82                    if(exits[l] < tmp) {
 83                        tmp = exits[l];
 84                        minI = l;
 85                    }
 86                }
 87            }
 88
 89            // 走最少出路的方向
 90            current = new Point(nexts[minI]);
 91            board[current.x][current.y] = m;
 92        }
 93
 94        return true;
 95    }
 96
 97    private boolean accessable(int x, int y){
 98        return x >= 0 && y >= 0 && x < sideLen && y < sideLen && board[x][y] == 0;
 99    }
100
101    public static void main(String[] args) {
102        int sideLen = 9;
103        KnightTour knight = new KnightTour(sideLen);
104
105        if(knight.travel(4,2)) {
106            out.println("游历完成！");
107        } else {
108            out.println("游历失败！");
109        }
110
111        for(int y = 0; y < sideLen; y++) {
112            for(int x = 0; x < sideLen; x++) {
113                out.printf("%3d ", knight.board[x][y]);
114            }
115            out.println();
116        }
117    }
118}

帕斯卡三角

 1public class Pascal extends JFrame{
 2
 3    private final int maxRow;
 4
 5    Pascal(int maxRow){
 6        setBackground(Color.white);
 7        setTitle("帕斯卡三角");
 8        setSize(520, 350);
 9        setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
10        setVisible(true);
11        this.maxRow = maxRow;
12    }
13
14    /**
15     * 获取值
16     * @param row 行号 从0开始
17     * @param col 列号 从0开始
18     * @return
19     */
20    private int value(int row,int col){
21        int v = 1;
22        for (int i = 1; i < col; i++) {
23            v = v * (row - i + 1) / i;
24        }
25        return v;
26    }
27
28    @Override
29    public void paint(Graphics g) {
30        int r, c;
31        for(r = 0; r <= maxRow; r++) {
32            for(c = 0; c <= r; c++){
33                g.drawString(String.valueOf(value(r, c)), (maxRow - r) * 20 + c * 40, r * 20 + 50);
34            }
35        }
36    }
37
38    public static void main(String[] args) {
39        new Pascal(12);
40    }
41}
